title: Income Tax Department Urges Taxpayers: Review ITR Mismatches & File Revised Returns for AY 2025-26 by December 31, 2025
content:
# Income Tax Department Urges Taxpayers: Review ITR Mismatches & File Revised Returns for AY 2025-26 by December 31, 2025

Ek important update hai, fellow taxpayers! Income Tax Department (ITD) ne taxpayers ko unke Income Tax Returns (ITRs) mein discrepancies review karne aur Assessment Year (AY) 2025-26 ke liye revised returns file karne ki urgent appeal ki hai.

**Key Points to Note:**

*   **NUDGE Campaign:** The Income Tax Department ne ek data-driven 'NUDGE' campaign launch kiya hai. Iske तहत, department उन taxpayers ko SMS aur emails bhej raha hai jinke ITRs mein potential mismatches ya ineligible deduction/exemption claims (jaise ki Registered Unrecognised Political Parties (RUPPs) ko bogus donations) identify kiye gaye hain.
*   **Reason for Review:** Ye initiative isliye liya gaya hai taaki taxpayers apni filings ki correctness ko ensure kar sakein aur future inquiries ya refund delays se bach sakein.
*   **Crucial Deadline:** AY 2025-26 (Financial Year 2024-25) ke liye revised return file karne ki **last date December 31, 2025, hai**.
*   **What to do:**
    *   Agar aapko Income Tax Department se koi communication mila hai, toh apne ITR ko Form 26AS, Annual Information Statement (AIS), aur Taxpayer Information Summary (TIS) se carefully reconcile karein.
    *   Agar koi discrepancy milti hai, toh Section 139(5) ke under December 31, 2025, tak revised return file kar dein.
    *   Agar aapke claims genuine aur law ke according hain, toh aapko koi action lene ki zaroorat nahi hai.
*   **Consequence of Missing Deadline:** December 31, 2025, ke baad, revised return file nahi ho payega. Uske baad, agar corrections karni hongi, toh updated return (ITR-U) file karna padega, which will involve additional tax liability, interest, aur penalties.

Toh, jaldi se apne returns review kar lijiye aur agar correction required hai, toh December 31, 2025, se pehle revised return file karna na bhoolein!
